txt.en: 'Do me a favour and stay within the walls while you're here. I don't have enough guards to patrol outside as well.'
'I can't keep an eye on everyone all the time, but if you commit a crime here, I will find you!'
'Talk to Frideric the Elder. He's the closest thing we have to a leader.'
'I don't like turning people away, but if you start trouble here, you will be leaving!'
